casebody.data:
Benj. E. COOK, Executor of Last WILL and Testament of Elmer E. DRAKE, deceased, v. UNITED STATES of America. No. 1374. Circuit Court of Appeals, Tenth Circuit. Sept. 23, 1936. Benj. E. Cook, of Ponca City, Okl., for appellant. Daniel Dillon, Atty., Bureau of War Risk Litigation, of Oklahoma City, Okl., for the United States.

Before LEWIS, PHILLIPS, and BRATTON, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment reversed and cause remanded pursuant to stipulation of the parties.
